name: Squean
body:
Welcome to the SQUEAN stack!

(Sequelize, Express, Angular Node + Passport)

Squean is a seed that gets you up and running fast with a functioning Node/Angular app with authentication (local strategy only).

Passport is prebundled and the local (non-OAuth) strategies are setup. Passport has awesome support for virtually any login strategy you need (140+). The maintainer frequently supports the project on Stack Overflow. [Passport.js](http://passportjs.org/)

This project was inspired by Linnovate's [MEAN.io](http://www.mean.io/) which is an awesome option if you are using MongoDB with Mongoose. Squean offers a similar jump-off point to get you rolling ASAP with your MySQL-Express-Angular-Node project.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
